TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventQuery extends System.Management.ManagementQuery

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventQuery/cs/EventQuery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventQuery#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventQuery/vb/EventQuery.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在用戶端接收通知的執行個體時**Win32_Process**因為事件類別是建立 **__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文件http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 用戶端呼叫 方法，就可以同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在範例程式碼執行時，可以透過啟動處理序 (例如，[記事本]) 來測試這個範例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running.
